website_summaries.verdict: The HP Photosmart A526 snapshot printer is meant to be simple and easy to use, but we found it simplified to a fault. There aren't enough options in standalone mode, and it's not as fast as the competition.
cons: Fewer onboard features than the competition
requires a PC connection for image editing and enhancement

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we have had in 15 years. We completely wore out the first one
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Watts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement photo printer
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact printer and I loved it but apparently used it too much and I needed a replacement. The printer arrived earlier than expected and the packaging made it arrive safe and sound. I plugged it in and used it soon after it arrived and it worked exactly as I was used to. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: N. M. Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Review for A526 Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: The photo clarity is very good. It is also light and easy to carry. I feel that they could put a full cartridge in the package and also the cable to connect to the computer. It does a good job and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joane N

customer_reviews.title: works fine ..but the screen is a little too small...
customer_reviews.text: it works great but the screen is a little too small . it looks different in the internet but i'm ok with it ..thanks
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Nice pictures for a little while
customer_reviews.text: It worked when I got it, but no more. The timing tape inside the mechanism needs to be cleaned, but the unit doesn't come apart. Something you need to know about HP, after the warranty expires you are on your own. They won't even answer a simple email question.
customer_reviews.author: Kenilworthkid

customer_reviews.title: Good desk top photo printer
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to use, good quality prints. I have 2 of these and recommend- one at home and one at office.
customer_reviews.author: edward gross

customer_reviews.title: I tried to use it before I gave it away & it did a good job of printing pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer & gave it for a Christmas package. I tried to use it before I gave it away & it did a good job of printing pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good pictures
customer_reviews.text: Printer works just fine, but the sample ink cartridge that came with it had expired in 2008 (8 years prior to my purchasing the item in 2016). Had to buy a new one before being able to use the printer.
customer_reviews.author: LCJAlaska

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice little printer
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice little printer ... I had a different one that broke that had a lot more options right on top of the machine, even to delete a picture on the print card. Otherwise it is OK
customer_reviews.author: Leon Noorigian

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of printer
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of printer, the the blue is great, however didn't come with cord. Would still like if possible. TRudy
customer_reviews.author: Trudy L. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Saved my bacon
customer_reviews.text: Work in a hospital where we take pictures of patients. Old printer went kaput. HP wanted to supply us with a giant all in one machine. Since hp doesnt make anymore the new ones are 200 - 300 dollars. Yikes! The ones I ordered work great.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Danielson

customer_reviews.title: HP COMPACT PHOTO PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: THE HP PHOTO PRINTER WAS NOTHING BUT A PIECE OF JUNK! A VERY PRICIE PIECE OF JUNK. IT DID NOT WORK AT ALL. THE COLOR WAS AS IF THE INK WAS NEARLY EMPTY NOT NEW. I HAVE ANOTHER ONE THAT I BOUGHT SEVERAL YEARS AGO THAT STILL WORKS & WAS TRYING TO GET A REPLACEMENT BEFORE IT QUIT . DIDN'T HAPPEN . I WILL KNOW BETTER ANOTHER TIME. I HAVEN'T HAD VERY GOOD LUCK AT ALL WITH ANYTHING THAT I HAVE BOUGHT ON ANAZON.
customer_reviews.author: PHYLLIS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that they couldn't take it home with them
customer_reviews.text: This item wouldn't work after we got it. I'm sending it back for an exchange. Disappointed that they couldn't take it home with them.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Praytor

customer_reviews.title: I wanted one that could print 3 different sizes on ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one that could print 3 different sizes on the 4x6 photo paper and also have different type of borders.
customer_reviews.author: sue boyd

customer_reviews.title: Setup
customer_reviews.text: I just got this printer yesterday, and I can't get it to work. The red light won't stop flashing. HELP plz.... TIA Diane
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this printer. Came quickly and even had a used cartridge in it. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Drake

customer_reviews.title: Dark Photos
customer_reviews.text: This printer is ok if you are printing photos with light backgrounds, but if the background in the photo is dark the printer makes it darker. Seems to darken everything up, and there is no way to adjust the brightness that I can see. The instructions that it comes with are not great, and I found little support for it online. I do like that it's compact and easy to use, just wish the photo quality was a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: FatOrangeTabby

customer_reviews.title: HP PhotoSmart A526
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on sale and am very happy with it. I have an all-in-one that does pictures but it is to much of a bother to set-up the tray every time I want to print pictures. The A526 prints directly from the memory card. The pictures look great! I am very impressed with the quality of the prints. Great alternative to driving to a print shop or waiting for the mail!Good product!Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Pieces LLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Parties
customer_reviews.text: I use mine at parties, family reunions and anywhere that I may want to share prints with people that I won't see soon. True I could email them to them but it is easier to print them and be done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this on sale and am pleased with the quality of the prints. I had a kodak printer in the past and had planned on buying another to replace my broken one but couldn't beat the price I found this for. However, I agree with the person who said they could have included the wire to connect it to a PC. But when I need a quick picture printed it comes in handy. I AM having problems using a thumb drive with it but am not sure if it's the thumb drive itself or the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is this is really a terrible printer. Printed about a half dozen pictures -quality so-so. Couldn't figure out why then the pictures started printing very poor quality with a weird whitish color overlaying the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hp sprinter
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for several years now. Its quick and the pictures are nice. Ink is expensive if you go to the store but online isnt bad. I wouldnt spend 200 on it but its nice if you can get a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Jernigan

product_meta.title: HP Photosmart A526 Compact Photo Printer
product_meta.description: HP A526 Photosmart Compact Photo Printer. Effortlessly print photos, insert your memory card, select photos and print all without a PC. Preview your photos before you print, easily select photos on a 2.4 inch display. Take this printer almost anywhere, the compact design makes it easy to carry and fit in small spaces. Save time by browsing and selecting photos while you print, no need to wait. Wirelessly print from Bluetooth enabled devices. Get the photo you intended to take enhance photos with the touch of the HP Red eye Removal button. Make your photos the way you want them, without a PC. Easily remove red eye and enhance your photos. Make memories last print lab quality photos that resist fading for generations. Present photos with no need to trim edges or cut away borders.
feature_bullets: 2.4 in LCD Display, Preview your Photos before You Print
Lab Quality, Fade Resistant Photos that Last Generations
Auto Red Eye Removal, Photo Brightening, Smart Focus, Adaptive Lighting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
